Single Description: A cursed minigun. Roll Hard Bravery to resist your Daemon choosing the target instead. [Accurate, Dark]

Effect: A razor shockwave flies out in all directions, slicing all Near targets. Objects are bisected.
Single Description: A razor shockwave flies out in all directions, slicing all Near targets. Objects are bisected. [Accurate, Dangerous, Dark]

Effect: Burrow and devour. X=[Daemon Bond]. On hit, attack another target until you have hit X targets.
Single Description: Burrow and devour. X=[Daemon Bond]. On hit, attack another target until you have hit X targets. [Dark]

Effect: Next time you lose an opposed roll and at least one of your dice reads 1, change all 1s to 6s.
Single Description: Next time you lose an opposed roll and at least one of your dice reads 1, change all 1s to 6s. [Slow]

Effect: Pick 2: deal 2 damage; reset Mind skills reduced by enemies; knock Close targets to Near.
Single Description: Pick 2: deal 2 damage; reset Mind skills reduced by enemies; knock Close targets to Near. [Slow]

Effect: Appear directly behind anyone visible. Lights around them flicker and dim.
Single Description: Appear directly behind anyone visible. Lights around them flicker and dim. [Simple]

Effect: An apple curses temp. on bite! Pick 2: go blind; speak all thoughts; panic; hallucinate; turn ugly.
Single Description: An apple curses temp. on bite! Pick 2: go blind; speak all thoughts; panic; hallucinate; turn ugly. [Slow]

Effect: On jack-in, pick a Virus category. Defending against this chip is Hard for those Viruses.
Single Description: On jack-in, pick a Virus category. Defending against this chip is Hard for those Viruses.

Effect: Swap the value of two stats or two skills. Your appearance also shifts. Expires after 3 rolls.
Single Description: Swap the value of two stats or two skills. Your appearance also shifts. Expires after 3 rolls. [Slow]

Effect: Enter Close range and expose the target. If an ally attacks the target next, they deal +2 damage hit.
Single Description: Enter Close range and expose the target. If an ally attacks the target next, they deal +2 damage hit.

Effect: A bit of the target’s knowledge appears in writing! It’s more useful the more damage you deal.
Single Description: A bit of the target’s knowledge appears in writing! It’s more useful the more damage you deal.

Effect: 3 ghost servants! They are slow & vanish when hurt, but look & act haunting. One order each.
Single Description: 3 ghost servants! They are slow & vanish when hurt, but look & act haunting. One order each. [Slow]

Effect: Pick an ally in range that’s making an opposed roll; you can reroll their failed dice.
Single Description: Pick an ally in range that’s making an opposed roll; you can reroll their failed dice. [Awkward]

Effect: Slash the target with a flaming phoenix talon! X = the number of Near hostile Navis/Viruses.
Single Description: Slash the target with a flaming phoenix talon! X = the number of Near hostile Navis/Viruses. [Piercing]

Effect: Magical petals! When affected targets fail social Charm/Bravery rolls, you dictate what they say.
Single Description: Magical petals! When affected targets fail social Charm/Bravery rolls, you dictate what they say.

Effect: Lays a tripwire over an exit. On activation, it briefly stuns the target & teleports you behind them.
Single Description: Lays a tripwire over an exit. On activation, it briefly stuns the target & teleports you behind them. [Awkward]

Effect: A magic butterfly! Whoever wilfully grabs it takes 4 damage and gets +4 dice to their next roll.
Single Description: A magic butterfly! Whoever wilfully grabs it takes 4 damage and gets +4 dice to their next roll. [Slow]

Effect: Take 2 damage, pick a used chip from an ally’s Folder; you can use it once. Resets on jack-out.
Single Description: Take 2 damage, pick a used chip from an ally’s Folder; you can use it once. Resets on jack-out.

Effect: Ghost swords follow you. When someone tells a lie in range, the swords pierce their heart.
Single Description: Ghost swords follow you. When someone tells a lie in range, the swords pierce their heart. [Slow]

Effect: Everything in range heals 2 HP. It begins to drizzle.
Single Description: Everything in range heals 2 HP. It begins to drizzle. [Slow]

Effect: Your next 3 rolls/chips can come from wherever you want in range, even other Navis/Viruses.
Single Description: Your next 3 rolls/chips can come from wherever you want in range, even other Navis/Viruses. [Simple]

Effect: Summons a moonbeam from the sky. You are invisible as long as you stay within it.
Single Description: Summons a moonbeam from the sky. You are invisible as long as you stay within it.

Effect: On hit, temporarily encases the target in a block of ice.
Single Description: On hit, temporarily encases the target in a block of ice. [Dangerous, Slow]

Effect: Can only be used immediately after a Navi/Virus is deleted. You can briefly control their body.
Single Description: Can only be used immediately after a Navi/Virus is deleted. You can briefly control their body.

Effect: Your voice booms out, clearly heard by everyone within range.
Single Description: Your voice booms out, clearly heard by everyone within range. [Awkward, Slow]

Effect: On parry win, pick 1 (lasts 3 rolls): invert your gravity; flip your temp. skill changes; flip the target over.
Single Description: On parry win, pick 1 (lasts 3 rolls): invert your gravity; flip your temp. skill changes; flip the target over.

Effect: Erases any traces of your presence. Viruses outside line of sight forget they saw you.
Single Description: Erases any traces of your presence. Viruses outside line of sight forget they saw you.

Effect: Gaze into the target’s mind. You hear their thoughts until you roll, use a chip, or take damage.
Single Description: Gaze into the target’s mind. You hear their thoughts until you roll, use a chip, or take damage. [Awkward]

Effect: A blaring, frenzied beat! All in range downshift their next 3 Speed rolls. Objects also accelerate.
Single Description: A blaring, frenzied beat! All in range downshift their next 3 Speed rolls. Objects also accelerate. [Dangerous]

Effect: Mist seeps into the area. Any who jack out in the mist can invite a Close Navi to come with them.
Single Description: Mist seeps into the area. Any who jack out in the mist can invite a Close Navi to come with them.

Effect: Curses a target. The next time they take damage, their highest skill(s) are briefly reduced by 2.
Single Description: Curses a target. The next time they take damage, their highest skill(s) are briefly reduced by 2.

Effect: When you jack out, downshift the roll. A pillar of fire engulfs all in range.
Single Description: When you jack out, downshift the roll. A pillar of fire engulfs all in range. [Simple, Dangerous]

Effect: The target is covered in text of your choice, which needs a Hard Coding roll to erase.
Single Description: The target is covered in text of your choice, which needs a Hard Coding roll to erase. [Awkward]

Effect: Convert an object to your element. Your element slowly spreads, converting everything it touches.
Single Description: Convert an object to your element. Your element slowly spreads, converting everything it touches. [Dangerous, Slow, Mega]

Effect: A cursed key. Stuns the target and exposes their memories to view & edit, rendered as text.
Single Description: A cursed key. Stuns the target and exposes their memories to view & edit, rendered as text. [Awkward, Mega]

Effect: Resurrect a Navi. Needs a powerful server; it is destroyed soon after. They will not be the same.
Single Description: Resurrect a Navi. Needs a powerful server; it is destroyed soon after. They will not be the same. [Awkward, Dangerous, Slow, Mega]

Effect: Marks the target. Once per jack-in, you can warp Close & stun them, even if they are in other servers.
Single Description: Marks the target. Once per jack-in, you can warp Close & stun them, even if they are in other servers. [Slow, Mega]

Effect: A molten star appears above, growing larger, until the real-world server explodes into flames.
Single Description: A molten star appears above, growing larger, until the real-world server explodes into flames. [Dangerous, Slow, Mega]

Effect: Entombs a target Navi in an inescapable cell, buried within the server. Their PET disconnects.
Single Description: Entombs a target Navi in an inescapable cell, buried within the server. Their PET disconnects. [Awkward, Slow, Mega]

Effect: On hit, creates a fiendish doppelganger. At first, nobody can tell which is which. Ignores barriers.
Single Description: On hit, creates a fiendish doppelganger. At first, nobody can tell which is which. Ignores barriers. [Mega]

Effect: Before firing, spends a minute sucking power from all electronics on the power grid. Ignores barriers.
Single Description: Before firing, spends a minute sucking power from all electronics on the power grid. Ignores barriers. [Awkward, Dangerous, Slow, Mega]

Effect: A subtle, burrowing seed! After time passes, the user can control the target’s body, then mind.
Single Description: A subtle, burrowing seed! After time passes, the user can control the target’s body, then mind. [Mega]

Effect: On next chip use, change a word of its description to a perfect rhyme. Only affects appearance.
Single Description: On next chip use, change a word of its description to a perfect rhyme. Only affects appearance. [Simple]

Effect: Cursed envelope! Pick a letter. For 3 rolls, the target can’t use chips starting with that letter.
Single Description: Cursed envelope! Pick a letter. For 3 rolls, the target can’t use chips starting with that letter. [Piercing, Slow]

Effect: Sacrifice a BattleChip to upshift target’s next X rolls. X = # of capital letters in the chip name.
Single Description: Sacrifice a BattleChip to upshift target’s next X rolls. X = # of capital letters in the chip name. [Accurate]

Effect: Wild magic attacks two targets! If you hit both, swap their elements. Lasts until you roll 3 times.
Single Description: Wild magic attacks two targets! If you hit both, swap their elements. Lasts until you roll 3 times. [Piercing]

Effect: A big hologram crowd! They cheer spectacle, boo boring people, and disappear when harmed.
Single Description: A big hologram crowd! They cheer spectacle, boo boring people, and disappear when harmed. [Summon]

Effect: Paper rapier! Pick a letter; if the target’s element includes that letter, disable it for 3 rolls.
Single Description: Paper rapier! Pick a letter; if the target’s element includes that letter, disable it for 3 rolls. [Accurate]

Effect: Pick an unused chip in your Folder, heal X HP. X = # of vowels (including Y) in the chip name.
Single Description: Pick an unused chip in your Folder, heal X HP. X = # of vowels (including Y) in the chip name. [Simple]

Effect: Cast a magic bolt! Can instead be used to make your next 3 Affinity rolls using Info instead.
Single Description: Cast a magic bolt! Can instead be used to make your next 3 Affinity rolls using Info instead.

Effect: Spend X Info to turn the target’s element to a perfect rhyme of your choice for X*2 rolls.
Single Description: Spend X Info to turn the target’s element to a perfect rhyme of your choice for X*2 rolls.

Dmg: Add any custom chips below and they will automatically be applied to the main sheet.
